name: MindHub
overview:
MindHub is a newly created business hub that incubates and accelerates business alliances and startups that develop tech solutions.

Innovation Ecosystem

At MIND Hub we understand that tech and business talent, intra and external entrepreneurs, tech infrastructure, strategic collaboration and contact networks integrate any innovation ecosystem for startups to succeed. For that reason, we combine all those elements in one place to support new business opportunities and startups in the tech sector.

Our facilities are located strategically in Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico, as part of the CaliBaja Bi-National Mega- Region

This mega-region offers unique opportunities for tech business investment. There are intellectual, scientific and technological resources, an established base of experienced and skilled entrepreneurs and business people.
